Class CurrentCredit

  • java.lang.Object
    • CurrentCredit

  • public class CurrentCredit
extends java.lang.Object
    This method manages the user's available credit by using an array of quantity of denominations inserted multiplied by the machineMoney value multiplier

    • Method Detail

      • addCurrentCredit

        public void addCurrentCredit(int quant,
                             int element)
        This method adds the newly inserted quantity to the current quantity for each inserted denomination. Then it sums the credit and updates totalCredit
        Parameters:
        quant - newly inserted quantity of denomination
        element - which array element (denomination)

      • loadDenoms

        public void loadDenoms()
        This method initializes array with quantity of 0

      • collectMoney

        public void collectMoney()
        Accepts the money inserted and adds to credit
        Parameters:
        int - quant entered is the number of each denomination inserted into the machine

      • getQuantity

        public double getQuantity(int arrLocation)
        Get method for denomsInserted quantity
        Parameters:
        arrLocation - denomsInserted array element
        int - i is used as a placeholder for array element number
        Returns:
        quantity of that denomination inserted by user

      • getQuantity

        public double getQuantity(CurrentCredit element)
        Parameters:
        element - array location
        Returns:
        the quantity of denomination of that array element

      • setQuantity

        public double setQuantity(int arrLocation,
                          int quantChange)
        Parameters:
        arrLocation - is array element item
        quantChange - is the change in the quantity of denom, + or -
        Returns:
        CurrentCredit type number of denominations of user input
